title: Participatory Design and Implementation of Literacy Education Policies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts of literacy education and understanding of policy development processes
context.additional_context: Learners, role-playing as office/administrative professionals, focus on participatory approaches reflecting diverse stakeholders' (local community, educational institutions, learners) needs in literacy policy design, with flexible learning via personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can explain participatory decision-making processes that consider social contexts (gender, region, class) when designing literacy education policies.
Learners can propose literacy education program designs reflecting learners' daily-life tasks and local characteristics.
Analyze conflicts and resolution strategies during policy implementation to derive improvement plans
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
